summary: This is an email chain from July 18, 2019, within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, regarding Epstein's finances. A Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit invites colleagues to discuss the matter.

persons.name: Co-Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The sender of the email inviting colleagues to discuss Epstein's finances. They are a senior official in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email Discussion on Epstein Finances
events.description: The Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the SDNY sends an email inviting colleagues to swing by for a brief discussion about Epstein's finances.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: On July 18, 2019, prosecutors at the SDNY were actively discussing Jeffrey Epstein's finances.
The communication originated from the Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit, indicating the investigation involved potential corruption angles.
The email is a brief internal coordination request, suggesting ongoing investigative activity shortly before Epstein's arrest.
